sedate.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The wedding was rather a sedate occasion.
sedate.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: We continued our walk at a sedate pace.
sedate.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to give someone drugs to make them calm or to make them sleep
sedate.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: He was still in shock, and heavily sedated.
sedate.translation[1].definitions[0].not: Sedate is often used in the passive
